00007 InternalMessageProcessor::InternalMessageProcessor(RequestQueue* internalQueue,
00008                                                    RemoteRequestManagerHandler* rHandler,
00009                                                    LocalRequestManagerHandler* lHandler,
00010                                                    OutgoingClient* client) :
00011     _internalQueue(internalQueue),
00012     _remoteHandler(rHandler),
00013     _localHandler(lHandler),
00014     _client(client),
00015     _shutdown(false)
00016 {
00017     pthread_mutex_init(&_runMutex, NULL);
00018     pthread_mutex_init(&_queuedItemMutex, NULL);
00019 }

00045 void
00046 InternalMessageProcessor::run()
00047 {
00048     int runfailed = -1;
00049     struct timespec check_timeout;
00050     // Verify internal data state is sane
00051     if (_internalQueue == NULL) {
00052         return;
00053     }
00054 
00055     clock_gettime(CLOCK_REALTIME, &check_timeout);
00056 
00057     runfailed = pthread_mutex_timedlock(&_runMutex, &check_timeout);
00058 
00059     if (runfailed) {
00060         return;
00061     }
00062     
00063     // Kinda hacky, is this a good way?
00064     // queueLock locks the lock.  RequestQueue unlocks the lock when
00065     // an item is added to the queue, allowing us to block until items
00066     // are ready to be processed.
00067     _internalQueue->queueLock(&_queuedItemMutex);
00068     while(!_shutdown) {
00069         struct timespec timeout;
00070         int result = -1;
00071         
00072         clock_gettime(CLOCK_REALTIME, &timeout);
00073         timeout.tv_sec += 10; // Wait 10 seconds for timeout
00074         
00075         result = pthread_mutex_timedlock(&_queuedItemMutex, &timeout);
00076 
00077         // timedlock returns 0 on success, other on error/timeout
00078         if (!result) {
00079             // Do the processing of the queue item here
00080             processReadyQueue();
00081 
00082             pthread_mutex_unlock(&_queuedItemMutex);
00083             _internalQueue->queueLock(&_queuedItemMutex);
00084         }
00085     }
00086 
00087     // Unlock the shutdown
00088     _shutdown = false;
00089     pthread_mutex_unlock(&_runMutex);
00090 }
00091 
00092 void
00093 InternalMessageProcessor::shutdown()
00094 {
00095     _shutdown = true;
00096 }
00097 
00098 void
00099 InternalMessageProcessor::processReadyQueue()
00100 {
00101     std::queue<queueItem*> itemQueue;
00102 
00103     // Verify internal data state is sane
00104     if (_internalQueue == NULL) {
00105         return;
00106     }
00107 
00108     // All internal items are service id 0
00109     itemQueue = _internalQueue->getItemQueue(0);
00110 
00111     while (!itemQueue.empty()) {
00112         processQueueItem(itemQueue.front());
00113         itemQueue.pop();
00114     }
00115 }
00116 
00117 void
00118 InternalMessageProcessor::processQueueItem(queueItem* item)
00119 {
00120     int methodId = item->methodId;
00121     int serverId = item->serverId;
00122     arguments argList = item->argList;
00123 
00124     switch (methodId) {
00125     case MethodMap::IMShutdown:
00126         _shutdown = true;
00127         break;
00128     case MethodMap::IMGetServerList:
00129         // Sends a GET_SERVER_RESPONSE method call 
00130         // If returnService is set in the call, send the response to
00131         // the contained service id
00132         int32_t returnServiceId = 0;
00133         for (int i = 0; i < argList.i32Args.size(); i++) {
00134             if (argList.i32Args[i].name == "returnService") {
00135                 returnServiceId = argList.i32Args[i].value;
00136                 break;
00137             }
00138         }
00139         getServerList(returnServiceId);
00140         break;
00141     }
00142 
00143 }
00144     
00145 void
00146 InternalMessageProcessor::getServerList(int32_t serviceId)
00147 {
00148     std::vector<Server> servers;
00149     queueItem* item = new queueItem();
00150     arguments args;
00151 
00152     if (_internalQueue == NULL) {
00153         return;
00154     }
00155 
00156     item->methodId = MethodMap::IMGetServerResponse;
00157 
00158     if (_client != NULL) {
00159         servers = _client->getServerList();
00160 
00161         // Build the queueItem from the list of servers
00162         i32Arg count;
00163         count.name = "serverCount";
00164         count.value = servers.size();
00165         args.i32Args.push_back(count);
00166         // Add each server to the arguments
00167         // The argument map is:
00168         // i32Args: serverCount => count of servers
00169         // stringArgs: serverName => server address
00170         // i32Args: <servername>:port => server port
00171         // i32Args: <servername>:serviceid => service id (multiple
00172         // entries)
00173         // i32Args: <servername>:serverid => server id
00174         for (int i = 0; i < servers.size(); i++) {
00175             // Add the server address
00176             stringArg serverAddress;
00177             serverAddress.name = "serverName";
00178             serverAddress.value = servers[i].getServerAddress();
00179             args.stringArgs.push_back(serverAddress);
00180             // Add the server port
00181             i32Arg port;
00182             port.name = serverAddress.value + ":" + "port";
00183             port.value = servers[i].getServerPort();
00184             args.i32Args.push_back(port);
00185             // Add the server id
00186             i32Arg serverId;
00187             serverId.name = serverAddress.value + ":" + "serverid";
00188             serverId.value = servers[i].getServerId();
00189             args.i32Args.push_back(serverId);
00190 
00191             std::vector<int32_t> serviceIds = servers[i].getServiceIds();
00192             // Add the service ids
00193             for (int j = 0; j < serviceIds.size(); j++) {
00194                 i32Arg serviceId;
00195                 serviceId.name = serverAddress.value + ":" + "serviceid";
00196                 serviceId.value = serviceIds[j];
00197                 args.i32Args.push_back(serviceId);
00198             }
00199         }
00200     } else {
00201         i32Arg count;
00202         count.name = "serverCount";
00203         count.value = 0;
00204         args.i32Args.push_back(count);
00205     }
00206 
00207     _internalQueue->addItem(serviceId, item);
00208 }
